title: Math at the Supermarket: Math Games on the Go
excerpt: How to use shopping, car rides, and cooking for fun math practice.
author: Smart Worksheets Team
content:
How Much Change Should We Get?

Ask your child to calculate the change when the cashier returns it. This is excellent subtraction practice.

License Plates

While driving, try to add up the digits on the license plate of the car in front of you. Who gets to the answer first?
